attributes.action: Levernside road glasgow the road the worst damaged road in Great Britian
attributes.background: The road surface on this road is so bad it looks like it was bombed in a war zone Some of the hole are so big they will definitely damage your vehicle if not correctly driven past This road needs fixing badly befir people start putting i claims for damaged vehicles and espcially when we pay road tax

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council. 

The Glasgow City Council has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the council here:
https://www.glasgow.gov.uk/index.aspx?articleid=17716
